overview: Experience the Holy Land like never before. Join Dr. Tony Evans and his daughters, Priscilla Shirer and Chrystal Evans Hurst, as they retrace the steps that changed the world in ‘Journey with Jesus’ - in theaters this fall. Filmed on location in Israel, ‘Journey with Jesus’ brings us the Bible to life as Evans, Shirer and Hurst lead a beautiful and captivating walking tour of the historical sites and places of Jesus’ ministry, delivering personal insights, powerful teaching and biblical context for each location.
tagline: Experience The Wonders of the Holy Land
title: Journey with Jesus
